page.title: 03Pamington Court Farm 2
page.content: This page is about Pamington Court Farm today. Pamington Court Farm is a large farm near Ashchurch.The area around it is mainly flat.The present owner of the farm is Mr Hill.His family has been living here for 34 years.He owns 386 acres and about half of it is arable farming mainly wheat.There are 21 big fields.Mr Hill has 74 milking cows plus 170 other cattle.(He also has a few sheep and a few hens).Each cow gives 6500 litres of milk a year.The cows are milked everyday at 6.00am and again at 3.30pm.Mr Hill can store 2400 litres of milk at the farm.The milk tanker however comes everyday.The milk that is produced today is pasteurized at Cotteswold Dairy in Tewkesbury and will be on our doorsteps tomorrow.Mr Hill runs the farm with only two employees.
